title: My Controls are Jacked
body: I had turned all my settings down to stuff like windowed and quality low on everything once because I was lagging. To put it back to normal, I hit "Restore Default" on all the different pages, except now, to move, I have to click Shift+Right Click and when I try to fix it the pop up says "type a key" but wont accept plain right or left clicks. Can anyone help me with this?

replies.body:
Hey Jsquirrel,

It sounds like some corruption in your input.ini file. I recommend you delete the file, then launch a custom game to verify everything is working properly! This will recreate the file and should resolve this weird click issue. You can find the input.ini file in your League install location (Usually - C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config)

Let me know if you have any questions!
Glad to hear that it worked! Good luck and have fun!
